title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment 
Equality and Preservation of Certain Records Act 2024 (Part 3) 
(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited maternity protection employment equality preservation certain record act 2024 (part 3) (commencement) order 2024

title: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maternity Protection, Employment
heading: 2. The 5th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 3
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 3 
of the Maternity Protection, Employment Equality and Preservation of Certain 
Records Act 2024 (No. 37 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 November, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [600] 3
